channel.title: - Articles
channel.description: Data analyis, data visualisation, personal development, and more by Hanna Nykowska

item.title: How To in Alteryx: Multi-Row Formula Tool for Rank
item.description: Not sure how to leverage Multi-Row Formula Tool? In this short video, I’ll show you how to use it to rank data.

item.title: How To in Alteryx: Multi-Row Formula Tool for Filling Missing Data
item.description: New to Multi-Row Formula Tool? Or maybe not new but still a bit confused? Learn how to use it to fill in missing data in 5 minutes!

item.title: Python Tool in Alteryx: Deduplicating Images
item.description: New to python tool in alteryx or python in general? Here’s a step by step description of how I built an app that identifies duplicate images and moves them to a new location.

item.title: Tableau Tip: The INDEX Trick
item.description: I wanted to share something that I have found very useful in the past year. What I have in mind, is something I call ‘the Index trick’.

item.title: How to build Chord Chart in Tableau with Table Calculations and LODs
item.description: Want to build a chord chart but don’t have access to fancy data preparation tools? I got you covererd!

item.title: Connect to Spotify API with Alteryx
item.description: The authentication process for Spotify API is a bit tricky. I thought I’d make your life easier so that you could start using this API yourself!

item.title: Tableau Tip: Highlight Table with Info Icons
item.description: Oh, so you want detailed data in form of highlight table that includes info button for each row? I got you covered!

item.title: How to: Automated Alteryx Reports
item.description: Say you have data that gets regularly updated and you need to send those updates to multiple people. Build automated reports with Alteryx!

item.title: Tiny Tableau Tip: how to use a colour palette with a dummy field

item.title: What’s it like being a Project Manager: let’s get personal
item.description: In one of my previous blog posts, I wrote some tips on project management. But I didn’t really share my personal experience. Let’s get personal.

item.title: Overambition, fear of failure and impostor syndrome: welcome to my brain
item.description: Seemingly, listening to other people talk about their struggles and how they deal with or even overcome them is actually quite helpful. With that in mind, I thought I’d share some of my experience.
